name: Snyk
description: Developer security platform — SCA, container, IaC scanning with reachability analysis

tools: test_project — Test a project for vulnerabilities
get_issue — Get issue details including fix guidance
list_projects — List projects in an org

setup_steps: 1. Create API token: app.snyk.io → Settings → General → API Token
2. Find your org ID: Settings → General → Organization ID
3. Free tier supports up to 200 tests/month
4. Enterprise tier adds reachability analysis and priority scoring
security_notes: API token is scoped to the user — use a service account
Read-only access is sufficient for MCP use cases
Snyk sends dependency manifests to cloud for analysis (not source code)
Reachability analysis (Enterprise) is the key differentiator for AI triage
